trans-unit.source: Specifies whether a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel"></xref> object on a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar"></xref> control is owner-drawn or system-drawn.
trans-unit.target: Especifica se um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel"> </xref> do objeto em um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar"> </xref> controle é desenhado pelo proprietário ou desenhadas pelo sistema.

trans-unit.source: Use the members of this enumeration to set the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Style%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> class.
trans-unit.target: Use os membros dessa enumeração para definir o valor da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Style%2A>propriedade de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>classe.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Style%2A>

trans-unit.source: The Style property determines the way in which the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> will be displayed.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade de estilo determina o modo no qual o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>será exibido.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> objects can display simple text or be owner-drawn.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>objetos podem exibir texto simples ou ser desenhados pelo proprietário.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>

trans-unit.source: Owner-drawn <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> objects support displaying images or a different font from the rest of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> objects on a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> control, while system-drawn <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> objects are used to display only text (or text and an icon if an icon is specified in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Icon%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>).
trans-unit.target: Desenhadas pelo proprietário <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>objetos suporte exibindo imagens ou uma fonte diferente do restante do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>objetos em um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar>controle, enquanto desenhado pelo sistema <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>objetos são usados para exibir somente texto (ou texto e um ícone se um ícone é especificado no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Icon%2A>propriedade do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>).</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Icon%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>

trans-unit.source: To perform the owner-draw operations on an owner-drawn <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.DrawItem> event of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> control.
trans-unit.target: Para executar as operações de desenho proprietário em um desenho proprietário <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>, use o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.DrawItem>eventos do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar>controle.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.DrawItem> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel"></xref> is drawn by the owner.
The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel"></xref> displays text in the standard font.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel"> </xref> exibe o texto na fonte padrão.
